Can I use a controller when playing Baldur's Gate 3 on PC?

The game has full controller support on launch. (Not available on Early Access)

Will there be modding support in Baldur's Gate 3?

With BG3 patch #7, official modding tools and launcher have been added to the game. You can play the game with the mods you like.
